properties.name: kafka.authentication.enabled
properties.description: true if we want authentication upon topic send or receive

properties.name: kafka.client.username
properties.description: The user name to use for kafka authentication

properties.name: kafka.client.password
properties.description: The password name to use for kafka authentication

properties.name: kafka.report.request.topic
properties.description: Topic name to use for receiving report commands

properties.name: kafka.report.outcome.topic
properties.description: Topic name to use for sending report results
